title: Stampede at Soccer Stadium in Cameroon Kills at Least Six People
sub_head: Many also injured outside venue during African Cup of Nations match in capital city
body:
A stampede outside a soccer stadium in the capital of Cameroon killed at least six people during an African Cup of Nations match on Monday.
Details of the tragedy at Yaoundeâ€™s Olembe Stadium were only confirmed after the game. The crush happened as crowds struggled to get access to the stadium.
